titles.title: Line Item Veto Amendment
A joint resolution proposing a constitutional amendment to authorize the President to exercise a line-item veto over individual items of appropriation.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S614-615)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6898-6901)

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President the authority to reduce or disapprove any item of appropriation in any Act or joint resolution.
